summary: The National Science Foundation supports the design, construction, and operations of science and engineering research infrastructure. We report annually on these NSF-funded projects. Since our June 2021 report , NSF has finished building the Daniel K. Inouye Solar Telescope. But NSF continues to face cost increases and schedule delays, primarily due to the pandemic, for its major facilities projects still under construction. NSF implemented 2...
title: National Science Foundation: Continued Cost and Schedule Increases for Major Facilities Projects in Construction
